experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: -Retrieved data for 900+ missing values using the geo-coding API and grouped the stores within a 25 km range-Collected information for 4K+ POIs and mobility using the Google Places API and the Google Mobility Community-Using both datasets, 95 continuous features were created, and they were all mapped to store ids-Used Trial Run's staging environment to carry out iterations to evaluate the progress of the matching algorithm
experience.description_html: -Retrieved data for 900+ missing values using the geo-coding API and grouped the stores within a 25 km range-Collected information for 4K+ POIs and mobility using the Google Places API and the Google Mobility Community-Using both datasets, 95 continuous features were created, and they were all mapped to store ids-Used Trial Run's staging environment to carry out iterations to evaluate the progress of the matching algorithm <!---->

experience.title: Research Project | IIT Kharagpur, India | University of Edinburgh, UK
experience.description: Decision Analytics Project - "Fairness Utility and Cross Efficiency-based Z-DEA Model"-Implemented traditional Data Envelopment Analysis CCR, BCC, and Fuzzy DEA model in GAMS software-Formulated the Z-Number version of the cross efficiency DEA model based on the perspective of fairness utility-Implemented the proposed model in GAMS software and analyzed the performance of the model using 3 datasets-Visualized and compared the results from the proposed model to that of existing models using Origin software
experience.description_html: Decision Analytics Project - "Fairness Utility and Cross Efficiency-based Z-DEA Model"-Implemented traditional Data Envelopment Analysis CCR, BCC, and Fuzzy DEA model in GAMS software-Formulated the Z-Number version of the cross efficiency DEA model based on the perspective of fairness utility-Implemented the proposed model in GAMS software and analyzed the performance of the model using 3 datasets-Visualized and compared the results from the proposed model to that of existing models using Origin software
